timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova using word synonym implies that we have some main name, which is not the case. I'd suggest to rename it to names

timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova with this nested enum we are going to access standard actions with expression like Action.Actions.READ. Does not look great. It will make more sense to rename this enum to Standard or maybe it will be even better to change READ and WRITE to be public static fields in Action interface. This way we are going to access standard actions with Action.Standard.XYZ or Action.XYZ.

replies.bodyText: @olegmoz I'd like to keep enum as it allows iterating over items, creating ByString class for obtaining enum item from string. I'll use this class later in Permission.ByName to keep ctor from string action representation.
replies.author: olenagerasimova

timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova please update method description to reflect recent changes
